xxl.core.cursors.identities
Interface TeeCursor.StorageArea<E>

Type Parameters:
E - the type of the elements this storage area is able to store.
All Known Implementing Classes:
TeeCursor.FileStorageArea, TeeCursor.ListStorageArea, TeeCursor.QueueStorageArea
Enclosing class:
TeeCursor<E>
public static interface TeeCursor.StorageArea<E>

This interface is used to store the objects delivered by the iteration specified in a tee-cursor's constructor and to return them, if the method cursor of the class implementing this interface is called. Furthermore the behaviour of a storage area can be determined implementing the method isSingleton with the intention to show if the storage area can be traversed more than one time.

Method Summary
 void close()
          Closes the storage area.
 Cursor<E> cursor()
          Returns an iteration containing all objects that are currently belonging to this storage area.
 void insert(E o)
          Inserts the given object into the storage area.
 boolean isSingleton()
          If a storage area can be traversed exactly one time this method should return true, otherwise false.
 

Method Detail

insert

void insert(E o)
Inserts the given object into the storage area.

Parameters:
o - the object to be inserted in the storage area.

cursor

Cursor<E> cursor()
Returns an iteration containing all objects that are currently belonging to this storage area.

Returns:
an iteration that contains all objects of the storage area.

isSingleton

boolean isSingleton()
If a storage area can be traversed exactly one time this method should return true, otherwise false.

Returns:
true if the storage area can be traversed exaclty one time, false otherwise .

close

void close()
Closes the storage area. Signals the storage area to clean up resources, close files, etc. After a call to close a call to close is not guarantied to yield proper results. Multiple calls to close do not have any effect, i.e., if close was called the storage area remains in the state closed.
